TextLibrary.Text: The Minotaur King is too well protected by the Ribs of Sartek. You must fight him again.
Having defeated the Minotaur King, you take the ribs that he had fashioned into some crude armor.
The Ribs of Sartek are not here.
With the ribs now in place, Sartek's body is beginning to take shape.
You must seek out the Ribs of Sartek, hidden somewhere within the Realms of War.
You must return the Ribs of Sartek to Tauron at the Horned Temple.
This Minotaur King is wearing armor made from the Ribs of Sartek. These provide much protection when he takes large amounts of damage.
